titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning health promotion and disease prevention.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the powers of the federal government should be utilized to: (1) enhance the science base required to fully develop the field of health promotion and disease prevention; and (2) explore how strategies can integrate lifestyle improvement programs into national policy, health care workplaces, families, and communities.
